title: Syndra 10 Skins

embed.description: hi guys, long time since i posted , i've been working on this , syndra is my favorite and my main champion in league of legends and i have many ideas for her so i decided to do 10 at once .... &nbs...

body:
i luv  {{champion:134}}  she's my favorite and my main champion in league of legends, she never get banned and rarely played but yet she's lethal.
 i have many ideas for her so i decided to do 10 at once :D ....  i set a challenge to create one skin a day i succeeded for all of them but the "Dj" one took me almost 3 days to create ... anyways tell me what do u think guys and which one you prefer ?

replies.body: Very cool! I think I like B.Moon best. Nice work! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Meowriko,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vA2GytTm,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:32:38.794+0000)
>
> Very cool! I think I like B.Moon best. Nice work! :)

Please make a Snow Queen Syndra skin for the next snowdown o.o She would fit the theme perfectly. Since she's all about having power and Queens have a lot of power. She could either have Ice Crystals, SnowBalls, Or even Snowflakes as balls o.o

Anyway, we could use a 975/1350 RP Syndra skin, atlantean came out a time ago already and the Diamond Queen isn't really special..
I agree the B.Moon looks awesome :3 I just started using Syndra and all her skins are very pretty! B.Moon skin are awesome thought with the Japanese style <3 {{champion:134}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Meowriko,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vA2GytTm,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:32:38.794+0000)
>
> Very cool! I think I like B.Moon best. Nice work! :)

thank you meowriko :)
What about arcade mahlz summons pacman ghost or syndra makes them and throw them in her arcade skin

Fantastic work! I'm impressed with how you've understood some of the core themes of our skin lines. In terms of being close to what I would do for a skin in those themes I think Victorious, Blood Moon and Teacher are right on the mark. My favourite is actually Sultana - middle eastern design is something we have not utilised much and using henna tattoos is a nice touch.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vA2GytTm,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2015-09-12T07:22:44.468+0000)
>
> Fantastic work! I'm impressed with how you've understood some of the core themes of our skin lines. In terms of being close to what I would do for a skin in those themes I think Victorious, Blood Moon and Teacher are right on the mark. My favourite is actually Sultana - middle eastern design is something we have not utilised much and using henna tattoos is a nice touch.

ty kindlejack , each time that i do these i understand that hard work that you have to do in riot (keeping  silhouette , choosing the right colors ...etc) i tried to do my best and learned so much observing the works that u did in the past
There needs to be a dodgeball syndra
I'm liking the arcade one, kappa
you mean 'koopa' :P
Riot: Let's release a 750 RP skin no one asked for instead!
I need that Blood Moon
I'd kill for Victorious Syndra! That's beautiful. Please Rito, next season please. :)
Those are awesome!  Love B.moon and Victorious
Dragon, Snow and Victorious are the best!

I can imagine that arcade.
RIP green shells. Make her Q green shells since they're inaccurate.
But when she ults, it homes in on you so make it red shells. RIP
*Blue Shells. ;)
Lol was about to say make her q red shell ult green shells but the last one blue haha

hahah y'all are mistaken

regular q is green shells
level 5 q is red shells
regular ult is red shells
level 3 ult is blue shells
I would totally buy the DJ one tbh :3
Love the snow and dragon concepts , i think Syndra and Lissandra are the n1 champs who need another skin for the moment , make them Halloween Lissandra and christmas Syndra please !!

> [{quoted}](name=Syndrarella,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vA2GytTm,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2015-09-12T20:20:00.452+0000)
>
> I would buy RP to unlock all 10... Twice.

lol thanks , i appreciate that
I'm really feeling Blood moon and Victorious :o
Where is the poro overlord syndra?

Love Arcade Syndra. Arcade Syndra has many possibilities and i really hope we get a skin similar to this since the Arcade team lacks a mid laner

Arcade:
SUPP: Sona
TOP: Riven
ADC: Miss Fortune
JUNGLE: Hecarim
Mid: ? ? ?

Inbefore "veigar". Veigar isn't part of the Arcade team. He's part of the bosses team

My favorites are Snow Syndra, Arcade Syndra and Blood Moon, Victorious too
Arcade lissandra
I never did understand why riot didn't make a striker Syndra for the world cup event. It seems so obvious...
Goal Keeper and Arcade are the best IMO
I think teacher is the best.. The only teacher skin we have is legacy
I would buy all of these in a heartbeat, except for the Victorious one which would cause me to actually play ranked. =P
Bloodmoon, teacher, arcade and goal keeper are my favourites. Goal Keeper and Arcade in particular are pretty cool, though look wise bloodmoon is definitely my favourite! It looks fantastic.
Dragon Queen Syndra <333333333
Dragon Syndra please. After that, the rest.
Love the arcade with the green shells.

Ooo the dragon one looks amazing!
Ult firing multiple fireballs would be so cool.
These are great! I love the Victorious and Arcade Skins
T^T I was working on a DJ syndra skin but now I've seen yours and it's so similar

Very well done.
I think my favourite is Sultana.

But I think Project Syndra should look like the Lotus from Warframe. :D
Love all of them omg
GK Syndra - i love it. PLZ DO IT RIOT. PLZ.

First things first...

**SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY**

With that out of the way....

The Project skin gives me fucking life.

The DJ skin is totally awesome, but her orbs **MUST** be disco balls. Like, they 100% have to be disco balls. That is all.

I find all but the victorious skin cool (course i don't like any of the victorious/champion skins). The arcade skin and the DJ skin i think could turn out the best though (Sona proves this :P)

A question on the side though.  Is sultana the female version of sultan? I'm pretty much just assuming this.
I like Dragon... then again I like anything dragon.
Victorious would literally be the actual concept with minor changes. sadly though i don't think it'll ever happen.
Awww, no bowling Syndra? but that is like, the hilarius best, i love to think of syndra bowling and like, throwing the ball and making a hole in the flor insteald of making it roll.
pool party syndra??
Arcade and Snow are nice.  You left out Pool Party... omg, why? v_v
